headline: Newmont Reduces its Holdings in Discovery Silver to 8.6%
summary: Prior to the sale, NEM held 119,716,667 common shares of Discovery Silver, representing roughly 14.95% of the company's outstanding shares.

headline: Thoughts About i-80 Gold's Massive Dilution
